nodeList.loreText: One day all that will be left of us will be echoes in the abyss
nodeList.nodeDescription: A nova that echoes from enemies it hits and applies abyssal decay. Enemies with abyssal decay take void damage over time for 6 seconds, if they take a hit all the damage from abyssal decay is dealt to them immediately.

nodeList.description: Abyssal Echoes has increased pull strength.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [25%] increased pull strength per point

node.altText: No effect if you have the Temporal Echonode.
node.description: Abyssal Echoes hits pull enemies, but Abyssal Echoes costs more mana.
Abyssal Echoes hits in a larger area and costs less mana, but no longer echoes when it hits an enemy.
node.nodeDescription: Abyssal Echoes no longer echoes from enemies it hits. 40% increased mana efficiency. 40% increased area of effect.

node.description: Your melee attacks have additional void penetration for each time you have manually cast Abyssal Echoes recently (last 4 seconds).
node.nodeDescription: You have [7%] increased melee damage and damage over time for each time you have cast abyssal echoes in the past 4 seconds.

node.description: Abyssal Echoes has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] increased mana efficiency per point. [5%] increased cast speed per point.

node.description: Abyssal Echoes has a chance to ignite enemies.

node.altText: This does not count as healing and does not scale with increases to healing effectiveness.

nodeList.altText: {Temporal Blight} is a debuff that reduces attack, cast, and movement speed by 5%. Lasts 2 seconds.
nodeList.description: {Temporal Blight} also reduces enemy armor.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Temporal blights also debuffs armour by [20] per point

node.description: Abyssal Echoes hits inflict {Temporal Blight} for 2 seconds, a debuff that reduces attack, cast, and movement speed by 5%.
node.nodeDescription: Hitting an enemy with abyssal echoes also inflicts them with temporal blight for 2 seconds. Temporal blight lessens attack speed, cast speed and movement speed by 5% (multiplicative with other modifiers).

nodeList.altText: Recasts can be interrupted by being stunned, frozen or time locked.
nodeList.description: Abyssal Echoes costs less mana, but there is a longer delay between the recasts created via the {Temporal Echo} and {Abyssal Cadence} nodes.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [20%] increased delay per point between the additional casts of abyssal echoes created by the temporal echo and abyssal cadence nodes. [20%] increased mana efficiency per point.

node.altText: Recasts can be interrupted by being stunned, frozen or time locked.
node.description:
Abyssal Echoes is automatically recast in 1 second, but costs more mana.

Prevents pulls from Pull of the Void.
Abyssal Echoes has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] increased mana efficiency per point. [5%] increased cast speed per point.

nodeList.altText: The base delay between recasts is 1 second. Recasts can be interrupted by being stunned, frozen or time locked.
nodeList.description:
Abyssal Echoes is automatically recast additional times, but costs more mana.

Prevents pulls from Pull of the Void.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [35%] increased mana cost per point. Abyssal echoes is automatically cast [1] additional time[s] per point. There is a one second delay between each cast by default.

node.description: Abyssal Echoes has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] increased mana efficiency per point. [5%] increased cast speed per point.

node.loreText: One day all that will be left of us will be echoes in the abyss
node.nodeDescription: A nova that echoes from enemies it hits and applies abyssal decay. Enemies with abyssal decay take void damage over time for 6 seconds, if they take a hit all the damage from abyssal decay is dealt to them immediately.

node.altText: This does not count as healing and does not scale with increases to healing effectiveness.
node.description: You gain regain health whenever Abyssal Echoes echoes.
Abyssal Echoes has increased cast speed and costs less mana.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] increased mana efficiency per point. [5%] increased cast speed per point.

node.loreText: One day all that will be left of us will be echoes in the abyss
node.nodeDescription: A nova that echoes from enemies it hits and applies abyssal decay. Enemies with abyssal decay take void damage over time for 6 seconds, if they take a hit all the damage from abyssal decay is dealt to them immediately.

stats.statName: Health Restored to Allies On Hit
